channel.title: Comments on: iPhone or Android: Your Smartphone defines your Character
channel.description: Top rated Techs, Products and Reviews

item.title: By: Ahyari
item.dc:creator: Ahyari
item.description: Android = so many brand using the OS = more people (1.4 billions). iOS = only Apple; but hit 505 millions World Wide? This is something!
item.content:encoded:
Android = so many brand using the OS = more people (1.4 billions).
iOS = only Apple; but hit 505 millions World Wide? This is something!

item.title: By: Anveksha
item.dc:creator: Anveksha
item.description: Awesome infographic. I love being an android user as it redefines my personality.
item.content:encoded: Awesome infographic. I love being an android user as it redefines my personality.

item.description: Allen, You are right, but only you. :p
item.content:encoded: Allen, You are right, but only you. :p

item.description: I don't understand why Android users would be afraid of GOD?
item.content:encoded: I don’t understand why Android users would be afraid of GOD?

item.title: By: Allen
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.description: Well, i am an android user , I don't have an addiction to masturbation and I do have a girlfriend!!!
item.content:encoded: Well, i am an android user , I don’t have an addiction to masturbation and I do have a girlfriend!!!

item.title: By: John Mark
item.dc:creator: John Mark
item.description: Wow , one of the most complete and useful infographic i ever seen .Since 2012 i'm only using iphone and i love it , i don't need android anymore .
item.content:encoded: Wow , one of the most complete and useful infographic i ever seen .Since 2012 i’m only using iphone and i love it , i don’t need android anymore .

item.title: By: Ryan Percy
item.dc:creator: Ryan Percy
item.description:
Ahahah! I guess the kind of lifestyle people live with iPhone or Android varies according to their geolocation. For instance, most of the people with iPhones in India are "CRAZY DUDES" whereas people who own iPhone in Cambodia are profesisonals one.
Loved this infographic though. Cheers
item.content:encoded:
Ahahah! I guess the kind of lifestyle people live with iPhone or Android varies according to their geolocation. For instance, most of the people with iPhones in India are “CRAZY DUDES” whereas people who own iPhone in Cambodia are profesisonals one.

Loved this infographic though. Cheers
